name: MegaRats
description: The planet is under attack by Giant Rats. We don't know where they came from, or why they're here. Help the citizens of Mega Rats defend their cities.Mega Rats is a fun filled and carefully crafted mix of fluid physical motion and hilarious Giant Rats.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Modern CPU Graphics: Modern AMD, NVIDIA, or Intel GPU DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: Standard
recommended_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Latest Intel or AMD CPU Graphics: Latest AMD or NVIDIA GPU DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: Premium
